title: Brownstein: Acclaimed McGill grad Adam Gopnik baffled by Quebec tuition plan
author: Bill Brownstein
blurb: The New Yorker writer and former Montrealer was in town to deliver the Leacock Lecture at his alma mater.

title: Quebec tuition plan more evidence of Legault’s fear of anglos: Fraser
author: Andy Riga
blurb: "It is difficult to avoid the impression that there is ignorance and distrust behind its actions,” former federal official languages commissioner says of Quebec government.

title: An independent Quebec would be one of world's wealthiest nations: PQ
author: Philip Authier
blurb: "Quebec would be a friendly neighbour" to Canada, Parti Québécois Leader Paul St-Pierre Plamondon says as he releases a new study on the theoretical finances of a sovereign Quebec.

title: Former FACE school principal and founder charged with sexual assaults
author: T'Cha Dunlevy
blurb: Phillip Baugniet has been charged with several sexual offences alleged to have taken place during the 1970s-'90s.

title: About Last Night: Allen, Gallagher show Sabres kids how it's done
author: Erik Leijon
blurb: Jake Allen and Brendan Gallagher who were the difference-makers in a 3-1 Montreal Canadiens win over the Buffalo Sabres Monday night at KeyBank Center.
